title: ONE MONTH FREE at Ridgewood Arches! Welcome home!
neighborhood: South Minneapolis, on Busline, cheap parking, Eat Street
map_address: 223 Ridgewood Ave. So. near Pillsbury Avenue So.
posting_body: ['WELCOME HOME TO RIDGEWOOD ARCHES!', 'Cozy 1 bedroom in Perfect Minneapolis location, Now renting for September 2022!', 'Great One Bedroom / One Bathroom home now renting for $1060.00 and up on an 18 month lease.', "ONE MONTH FREE on first month's rent (restrictions may apply).", 'Our 1 bedrooms offer:', '• Gas Stove for classic style cooking', '• Open concept living room & kitchen', '• Huge closets and extra storage available', '• Updated Kitchens with dishwasher, microwave included', '• A/C and ceiling fan', '• All utilities except electric included in rent', '• Reserved parking available', '• 24 - Hour Package Pick-up', '• 24/7 Emergency Maintenance', '• On-site Professional Management team', 'Ridgewood Arches also features an exercise room to warm up while staying fit on those cool days, and an outdoor heated pool to enjoy every day of summer.', 'Pricing Subject To Change (Length of Lease, Move In Date, Availability)*', 'We are located within walking distance to all your favorite Uptown spots, Nicollet Avenue’s “Eat Street”, and Downtown Minneapolis.', 'With access to public transportation and bike trails, you can get around the city easily for work and play.', 'Website: <URL>', '*Bigos Management', 'Pricing and availability are both determined by requested move-in date, cannot be guaranteed due to on-site leasing activity, and are subject to change at any time']
